name: linkace
description: LinkAce is a self-hosted bookmark archive with tags, notes, link checking, and archive.org integration. It allows saving and organizing web links privately or publicly and supports API and imports.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Save links, Tags and notes, Archive.org integration. Preserve web content permanently

features.title: Link Checking
features.description: Automatic validation, Broken link detection, Status monitoring. Keep bookmarks healthy

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Tags and lists, Search functionality, Import/export. Organize bookmarks your way

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API, Browser extensions, Automation support. Integrate with your workflow
